details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.2.10 Transparency - Page transparency
details.description: If the document does not contain a PDF/A OutputIntent, then all Page objects that contain transparency shall include the Group key, and the attribute dictionary that forms the value of that Group key shall include a CS entry whose value shall be used as the default blending colour space.

rule.description: If the document does not contain a PDF/A OutputIntent, then all Page objects that contain transparency shall include the Group key, and the attribute dictionary that forms the value of that Group key shall include a CS entry whose value shall be used as the default blending colour space.
rule.test: gOutputCS != null || containsGroupCS == true || containsTransparency == false

error.message: The page contains transparent objects with no blending colour space defined.
